Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Central
ShortDescription: Westbound #63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin and 63rd, then resume their normal, due to street blockage near 63rd/Central.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Garfield

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
